vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.24.16
§ Pethahiah = "freed by Jehovah"
1) a priest, in charge of the 19th course, in the time of David
2) a Levite and returning exile who had married a foreign wife; probably the same as 3
3) a Levite who helped lead in the confession of the people in the time of Ezra; probably the same as 2
4) son of Meshezabeel, descendant of Zerah the son of Judah; deputy of the king in all matters concerning the people
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   sacerdote; en tiempos de David; (b)   levita; post exílico; (c)   hijo de Mesezabel; asistente del rey; tribu de Judá; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
毗他希雅 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華所釋放的"
1) 大衛王時負責帶領第十九班事奉工作的祭司 (代上 24:16)
2) 一位回歸的利未人, 他曾娶了一外邦女子為妻; 可能與 3) 同
3) 以斯拉時協助帶領民眾悔罪的一位利未人; 可能和 2) 同
4) 米示薩別的兒子, 猶大的兒子謝拉的後裔; 負責輔助王處理一切有關人民的事宜 (尼 11:24)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
毗他希雅 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华所释放的"
1) 大卫王时负责带领第十九班事奉工作的祭司 (代上 24:16)
2) 一位回归的利未人, 他曾娶了一外邦女子为妻; 可能与 3) 同
3) 以斯拉时协助带领民众悔罪的一位利未人; 可能和 2) 同
4) 米示萨别的儿子, 犹大的儿子谢拉的后裔; 负责辅助王处理一切有关人民的事宜 (尼 11:24)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.23
§ Pethahiah = "freed by Jehovah"
1) a priest, in charge of the 19th course, in the time of David
2) a Levite and returning exile who had married a foreign wife; probably the same as 3
3) a Levite who helped lead in the confession of the people in the time of Ezra; probably the same as 2
4) son of Meshezabeel, descendant of Zerah the son of Judah; deputy of the king in all matters concerning the people

3) a Levite who helped lead in the confession of the people in the time of Ezra; probably the same as 2
4) son of Meshezabeel, descendant of Zerah the son of Judah; deputy of the king in all matters concerning the people
